attributes.action: To recover the compensation that belongs to the Miners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently it has been discovered that Soliciters and others have benifitted out of Miners compensation packages.
Sign this petition to demand that miners compensation should be recovered and given back to the miners

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
